Package com.library.backend.services.admin

Class BookRegistrationService

java.lang.Object
com.library.backend.services.admin.BookRegistrationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Service
public class BookRegistrationService extends Object implements Service
The BookRegistrationService class provides functionality for registering new books and managing the corresponding book inventory. It includes methods for validating input, creating book entities, and saving book inventories and books.

Example Usage: 

 
 // Create a BookRegistrationService instance with BookInventoryRepository and BookRepository
 BookRegistrationService registrationService = new BookRegistrationService(BookInventoryRepository.getInstance(), BookRepository.getInstance());

 // Register a new book
 String title = "The Great Gatsby";
 String author = "F. Scott Fitzgerald";
 String year = "1925";
 String resume = "A novel capturing the essence of the Jazz Age.";
 Genre genre = Genre.FICTION;
 String amount = "5";
 try {
     registrationService.registerNewBook(title, author, year, resume, genre, amount);
     // Book registration successful
 } catch (IncorrectInputException | NumberFormatException e) {
     // Handle incorrect input or number format exception
 }
In this example, a BookRegistrationService instance is created, and the registerNewBook method is used to register a new book. If the registration is successful, the log will indicate success; otherwise, an IncorrectInputException or NumberFormatException is thrown with details about the failure.

The BookRegistrationService class implements the Service interface, providing a common interface for various services in the application.

  • Method Details

    • registerNewBook

      public void registerNewBook(String title, String author, String year, String resume, Genre genre, String amount) throws IncorrectInputException, NumberFormatException
      Registers a new book with the specified details, including title, author, year, resume, genre, and quantity.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the new book.
      author - The author of the new book.
      year - The publication year of the new book.
      resume - A summary or description of the new book.
      genre - The genre of the new book.
      amount - The quantity of the new book.
      Throws:
      IncorrectInputException - If the input validation fails.
      NumberFormatException - If there is an issue parsing numeric input.

    • saveInventory

      public void saveInventory(BookInventory bookInventory)
      Saves the specified BookInventory to the repository.
      Parameters:
      bookInventory - The BookInventory instance to be saved.

    • saveBook

      public void saveBook(Book book)
      Saves the specified Book to the repository.
      Parameters:
      book - The Book instance to be saved.
